entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:12 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
